CONTENT: Setting up data in aXcelerate FIRST
OUTLINEELEMENTS.SHORTDESCRIPTION: This course doesn't actually exist. It is only a test.
OUTLINEELEMENTS.INTRODUCTION: Ever wondered how to code against aXcelerate's APIs? Well, this fake workshop could teach you how!
OUTLINEELEMENTS.ADDITIONALINFORMATION: Price includes a complementary drink of water
OUTLINEELEMENTS.LEARNINGMETHODS: You will learn by seeing, hearing and doing
LEARNINGOUTCOMES: Learn how to read our API documentation
Learn the difference between a workshop, class, and E-learning activity
Code an amazing integration against the aXcelerate API

PARAMETERS.NAME: ID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ID of the activity you want details from.

PARAMETERS.NAME: type
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The type of the activity. w = workshop, p = accredited program, el = e-learning.
